global.htmlSuffix: <style>img { max-width:100% } html { font-family: "Helvetica"; font-size: 12px; } .liquid-video-wrapper{max-width:100%;} iframe{max-width:100%;}</style><script>for(var c = document.getElementsByTagName("a"), a = 0;a < c.length;a++) { var b = c[a]; b.getAttribute("href") && b.hostname !== location.hostname && (b.target = "_blank") }</script></body></html>
